name: SSF2
title: Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Vein Involvement
notes:
**Note 1:** Information about vein involvement is collected in T as an element in anatomic staging.Â  It is also collected in this field as it may have an independent effect on prognosis.

**Note 2:**  Record the involvement of specific named veins as documented in the pathology report. Do not code invasion of small unnamed vein(s) of the type collected as lymph-vascular invasion. Lymph-vascular invasion is usually only seen microscopically. 
* Assign code 000 if surgical resection of the primary site is performed, the pathology report is available for review, and involvement of these specified veins is not mentioned
rows: Involvement of inferior vena cava (IVC) below the diaphragm only
Involvement of IVC above the diaphragm only

020 + 010 

Involvement of IVC below the diaphragm plus involvement of renal vein

030 + 010 
 
Involvement of IVC above the diaphragm plus involvement of renal vein

040 + 010

Involvement of IVC, NOS plus involvement of renal vein

030 + 020 

Involvement of IVC above the diaphragm plus involvement of IVC below the diaphragm

030 + 020 + 010 

Involvement of IVC above the diaphragm plus involvement of IVC below the diaphragm plus involvement of renal vein
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No surgical resection of primary site

Unknown or no information  
Not documented in patient record
